start-node.title: Node setup Error
start-node.description: Got error while starting the node: {error}

node-status.title: Node status Error
node-status.description: Got error while retrieving node status: {error}

massa-wallet-check.title: Massa Wallet Check Error
massa-wallet-check.description: Got error while checking if Massa Wallet is installed: {error}

load-massa-wallet-accounts.title: Failed Loading Massa Wallet Accounts
load-massa-wallet-accounts.description: Got error while loading accounts list from Massa Wallet: {error}

staking-address-add.title: Failed adding staking address
staking-address-add.description: Got error while adding staking address: {error}

staking-address-delete.title: Failed deleting staking address
staking-address-delete.description: Got error while deleting staking address: {error}

home.stopError: Error while stopping the massa node

auto-restart.label: Auto Restart:
auto-restart.description: Automatically restart the node if it crash or desync

nodePassword.title: Enter Node Password
nodePassword.description: Please enter the password to start the node
nodePassword.warning:
⚠️ Warning: Keep your password secure. It will be used to encrypt your staking addresses. 
 If you forget it and the node is storing staking addresses, you will not be able to start the node again.
nodePassword.error: Invalid password. Please check your password and try again.

staking.node-not-running: The node needs to be up to retrieve staking addresses

download-wallet.title: Download Massa Wallet
download-wallet.description: Massa station wallet plugin is not installed or not activated. Please install or activate it to be able to import your staking addresses.

add-address.title: Confirm Add Staking Address
add-address.description: Node manager plugin need access to {nickname}' account's private key to start staking. Your key will be encrypted with the password you used to start the node.
add-address.warning: ⚠️ Node manager plugin is not a wallet: you will not be able to restore your account's private key from it. So DO NOT remove your account from massa wallet

delete-address.title: Delete Staking Address
delete-address.message: Are you sure you want to delete address {address} from node manager? All historic data related to this address will be deleted.

stakingAddressDetails.active-rolls-tooltip: It takes 3 cycles (about 1h40min) for new rolls to become active and be used for staking
stakingAddressDetails.deferred-credits-tooltip: When rolls are sold, staked MAS are frozen for a cycle before they can be spent

confirmModal.title: Update Roll Target
confirmModal.rollBuy: You are going to buy {rollsToBuy} rolls
confirmModal.rollSell: You are going to sell {rollsToSell} rolls
